metadata.feature_description: Navigate through paginated list of users with configurable page sizes

steps.action: Navigate to Admin > Manage > Users panel
steps.expected: Users panel opens with default page size of 10
steps.actual: Users panel opened showing '10 users per page' dropdown and 10 users displayed

steps.action: View pagination summary at bottom of user list
steps.expected: Total count should be displayed showing entries and total
steps.actual: Pagination shows 'Showing 1-10 of 20 entries' correctly displaying total count

steps.expected: Page 2 should load with next set of users
steps.actual: Page 2 loaded successfully showing 'Showing 11-20 of 20 entries' with different users (Test User6, Test User5, etc.)

steps.action: Click previous page navigation arrow from page 2
steps.expected: Page 1 should load with first set of users
steps.actual: Page 1 loaded successfully showing 'Showing 1-10 of 20 entries' with original users

steps.expected: Dropdown should show available page size options
steps.actual: Dropdown opened showing options: 10 users per page, 25 users per page

steps.expected: Page should update to show 25 users per page
steps.actual: Page updated showing 'Showing 1-20 of 20 entries' with all 20 users on one page, dropdown shows '25 users per page'

steps.expected: First and Previous buttons should be disabled on page 1
steps.actual: First and Previous navigation buttons appear grayed/disabled on page 1

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test last page boundary and jump to specific page

steps.expected: Should navigate to the last page with Next/Last buttons disabled
steps.actual: Navigated to page 3 (last page) showing 'Showing 21-21 of 21 entries' with SuperUser Account only. Next/Last buttons disabled.

steps.action: Observe page indicator in pagination controls
steps.expected: Current page number should be highlighted
steps.actual: Page indicator correctly shows highlighted page number (1, 2, or 3) depending on current page throughout all navigation tests

steps.action: Navigate to page 3 (last page) while on 'Authorized' filter
steps.actual: Successfully on page 3 showing 'Showing 21-21 of 21 entries'

steps.expected: Pagination should reset to page 1 and show 'Showing 1-10 of X entries'
steps.actual: User list shows page 1 content (Claude TestCreate first), but pagination summary incorrectly shows 'Showing 21-22 of 22 entries' and page indicator shows '3' instead of '1'. UI inconsistency - data reset but pagination counter did not update.

issues: Pagination counter UI does not sync correctly when filter changes - list shows page 1 content but pagination displays page 3 info

observations: Page size dropdown only offers 10 and 25 users per page options - test scenarios mentioned 50 and 100 but these are not available in the UI

Code at src/Modules/Evoq.PersonaBar.Users/EvoqUsers.Web/src/components/Body/index.jsx line 62 sets pageIndex=0 on filter change, but the resetIndex mechanism may have a bug that causes the pagination summary to not update correctly
